features: OPTIMAL ORAL HYGIENE - Freshens breath with the power of Neem! Our mouthwash is rich in botanical extracts & essential oils that are full of beneficial properties for both teeth and gums
GENTLE YET POWERFUL FORMULA - This natural mouthwash contains a potent Ayurvedic formula with 23 herbal extracts & 9 essential oils, including Neem & Peelu for a long-lasting freshness
HOW TO USE - For best results, rinse your mouth with water first. Use approximately 1/2 cup of mouthwash and swish for at least 1 minute. Gargle and spit out the mouthwash when finished
WHAT IS AYURVEDA - Ayurveda is the ancient holistic science of India which aims at a total harmony of mind, life, body and spirit in balance with nature's rhythms

ABOUT US - The crafted herbs and minerals used in Auromere products are known in Ayurveda for their unique beneficial and rejuvenating qualities. Perfect for maintaining hygiene, well-being and beauty

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Auromère Ayurvedic Mouthwash Auromère Ayurvedic Mouthwash with Neem & Peelu, 16 fl oz bottle
Auromère Ayurvedic Mouthwash Auromère Ayurvedic Mouthwash with Neem & Peelu, 16 fl oz bottle

Pure oral hygiene A gentle yet powerfully effective formula with a delicious flavor, rich with 23 botanical extracts & 9 essential oils including Neem & Peelu. ✓ Vegan ✓ Cruelty-free ✓ Non-GMO ✓ Fluoride-free ✓ Sulfate-free ✓ Gluten-free ✓ Alcohol-free

With Neem, Peelu, & over 20 additional roots, plants, barks and flowers Neem is the ultimate herbal ingredient for optimal oral hygiene. It has been used in Ayurveda for centuries, and today has a growing body of support from modern research. Similarly, Peelu has long been known as the "Toothbrush Tree" due to its beneficial properties for oral care. Auromère Mouthwash contains these legendary herbs along with Xylitol (from Birch bark), Anethol, Menthol, Eucalyptus, Mentha arvensis, Mentha piperita, Mentha viridis, Geranium, Cardamom, Clove, Pomegranate rind, Common Jujube, Rose Apple, Clove, Persian Walnut, Barleria prinoitis bark (Vajradanti), Bedda nut, Asian Holly Oak, Prickly Ash, Zanthoxylum alatum, Sappan wood, Catechu, Bengal Madder, Acacia arabica bark (Babul), Sarsaparilla, Cinnamon, Medlar bark, Mayweed, Bishop’s weed], Benzoic acid (Nature identical).

About Auromere The Ayurveda People Inspired by the wisdom of Ayurveda, each product is packed with herbal ingredients and botanical extracts. Pure, Authentic, & Effective With only natural ingredients, cruelty-free, vegan, and non-GMO. Many of the herbal extracts are wild-crafted in India. 100% Non-Profit Owned Entirely owned by a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization in the US, dedicated to the practice of Integral Yoga. Supporting Auroville Each year, a portion of all proceeds from Auromère are donated to help support Auroville, the City of Human Unity.

Ayurvedic Dental Care, Skin Care, Hair Care, & more! More than just natural, Auromère products are inspired by the ancient wisdom of Ayurveda and are crafted with premium Ayurvedic herbs and botanical extracts. The wild-crafted herbs and minerals used in Auromère products are known in Ayurveda for their unique beneficial and rejuvenative qualities. Pure, Authentic, & Effective: Auromère works closely with suppliers in India to ensure products are of the highest quality, engaging local specialists, Ayurvedic practitioners and cottage industries who provide employment in local village communities. The purity and authenticity of the ingredients, formulations and manufacturing procedures make each product remarkably effective in maintaining optimal hygiene, well-being, and beauty. Ayurveda ( आयुर्वेद ), translated literally as “Life-Knowledge”, is the ancient holistic system of well-being from India. It aims at a harmonious balance of Nature’s subtle energies through the cultivation of a conscious, healthy diet and lifestyle. Through the ages, beneficial links between the natural and human worlds were documented and passed down in a science that promotes bodily, psychological and spiritual well-being. For over 40 years, Auromère has been a leading importer of Ayurvedic body care products. What began as a small operation to help fund a residential spiritual community soon became one of the first companies to introduce Ayurveda to the US. In today’s highly competitive market, Auromère continues to grow while still staying true to its deeper inspirations and purpose. 100% Non-Profit Owned: Auromère is entirely owned by a non-profit Integral Yoga ashram in Northern California, and is run by members and volunteers of the ashram as part of their spiritual practice along with other staff. All proceeds from Auromère products support the upkeep and activities of the ashram, as well as other Integral Yoga efforts in the U.S. and India. Supporting Auroville: a portion of all proceeds are designated to support the development and growth of the eco-conscious, international “City of Human Unity” in Auroville, South India — an ongoing experiment in the transformation of consciousness, sustainable living, and the future cultural, environmental, social and spiritual needs of humankind. Cruelty-free pledge: Auromère is committed to providing natural, vegetarian body care products that are not tested on animals, and condemns the practice of cruelty to animals through drug and cosmetic testing. Over the years the Auromère brand has carried the seal of approval from the Humane Society, Beauty Without Cruelty, PETA (People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals) and the “Leaping Bunny” logo of the CCIC (Coalition for Consumer Information on Cosmetics).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I read the review that this would be a mouthwash that you would look forward to using and thought, no way. Absolutely way! This stuff is awesome, I am sold.That said it does keave an anise flavor. If your not a fan of that, then pass.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouth wash! It feels great on my gums after the rinse, it has a great flavor, and it doesn’t burn at all. Very much recommended.. A bit pricey TBH but you’ll feel like it’s worth it after getting to use it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh and Clean
reviews.reviewText: Got this since I have been using the toothpaste and together they are great! Taste is not bad. I like that this mouthwash doesn’t burn with use and makes my mouth feel clean. Also a plus that this product is ayurvedic. Just finished one bottle and just bought two more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not bad, but odd taste
reviews.reviewText: The mouthwash seems to be doing a good job, but the taste is definitely an odd one. May or may not order again, but I do appreciate the fluoride free option

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super gum relief 😌
reviews.reviewText: Came across this product at a Marshall's beauty section for cheap, figured I'd try it. The results of less bleeding gums, fresher breathe were amazing that I had to repurchase and found on Amazon. Yes, a but pricey but worth the results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Refreshing taste good value for price.I use this everyday

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Intense black licorice taste!
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Leaves mouth and teeth feeling fresh without overpowering mint flavor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the product, but not much substance for the money.

I've been using this for about 6 months... just had a checkup at the dentist and was told "keep doing whatever you're doing!" Too bad it's so expensive because it's way better than the other "stuff" that's full of @#$%.
An almost gingery taste? I very much like this mouthwash, doesn’t “sting” like the alcohol ones, and smells very good.
